players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie was killed last night, and I suspect Alice might be the mafioso. We should investigate them further."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions about Alice just yet. We need more information before we accuse anyone."
Bob: "I think we should investigate Alice further and see if they have any alibis for the time of Charlie's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
